DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, technical feasibility, and initial effectiveness (i.e., weight loss primarily measured as percent excess weight loss) of TGVR performed using the Bard RESTORe Suturing System
DOC.brief_title: Transoral Gastric Volume Reduction as an Intervention for Weight Management
